trans-unit.source: IP mask, in dotted decimal notation, for the IP Pattern parameter. Can have leading or trailing non-zero octets (for example, 255.255.240.0 or 0.0.255.255). Accordingly, the mask specifies whether the first n bits or the last n bits of the destination IP address in a client request are to be matched with the corresponding bits in the IP pattern. The former is called a forward mask. The latter is called a reverse mask.
trans-unit.target: IP模式参数的IP掩码，以点分十进制表示。可以具有前导或尾随的非零八位字节（例如 255.255.240.0 或 0.0.255.255 ）。因此，掩码指定客户端请求中目标IP地址的前n位还是后n位与IP模式中的相应位匹配。前者称为前向面具。后者称为反向掩模。

trans-unit.source: If IDRAC, this module will import iDRAC configuration from SCP file.

trans-unit.source: If NIC, this module will import NIC configuration from SCP file.
trans-unit.target: 如果是 NIC ，则此模块将从SCP文件导入NIC配置。

trans-unit.source: If NoReboot, it does not reboot the server.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 NoReboot ，则不会重新引导服务器。

trans-unit.source: If Off, End host power state is off.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 Off ，则结束主机电源状态为off。

trans-unit.source: If On, End host power state is on.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 On ，则“结束主机电源”状态为开启。

trans-unit.source: If RAID, this module will import RAID configuration from SCP file.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 RAID ，则此模块将从SCP文件导入RAID配置。

trans-unit.source: If Tcp is specified, a received ACK is required for the probe to be successful.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定了 Tcp ,则成功接收到的ACK是必需的。

trans-unit.source: If True then this rule set will be made active and all others inactive.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 True ,则此规则集将变为活动状态，而其他所有规则集将变为非活动状态。

trans-unit.source: If VULTR_API_ACCOUNT environment variable or api_account module parameter is not specified, modules will look for the section named “default”.
trans-unit.target: 如果未指定 VULTR_API_ACCOUNT 环境变量或 api_account 模块参数，则模块将查找名为“ default”的部分。

trans-unit.source: If absent a module is removed.
trans-unit.target: 如果 absent 则卸下模块。

trans-unit.source: If absent a repository is removed.
trans-unit.target: 如果 absent 则删除存储库。

trans-unit.source: If absent the host will be deleted from the cluster.
trans-unit.target: 如果 absent ，主机将从集群中删除。

trans-unit.source: If absent will ensure the app pool is removed.
trans-unit.target: 如果 absent 将确保删除应用程序池。

trans-unit.source: If absent will ensure the mapped drive does not exist.
trans-unit.target: 如果 absent 将确保映射的驱动器不存在。

trans-unit.source: If absent will ensure the policy is removed.
trans-unit.target: 如果 absent 将确保该策略被删除。

trans-unit.source: If absent, all given values will be removed if present.
trans-unit.target: 如果 absent ，则所有给定的值（如果存在）将被删除。

trans-unit.source: If absent, directories will be recursively deleted, and files or symlinks will be unlinked. In the case of a directory, if diff is declared, you will see the files and folders deleted listed under path_contents. Note that absent will not cause file to fail if the path does not exist as the state did not change.
trans-unit.target: 如果 absent ，目录将被递归删除，文件或符号链接将被取消链接。对于目录，如果声明了 diff ，您将在 path_contents 下看到删除的文件和文件夹。需要注意的是 absent 不会导致 file 到如果失败 path 不存在的状态并没有改变。

trans-unit.source: If absent, it removes a network static route.
trans-unit.target: 如果 absent ，它将删除网络静态路由。

trans-unit.source: If absent, the file will be removed.
trans-unit.target: 如果 absent ，文件将被删除。

trans-unit.source: If absent, the host configuration will be reset to default values.
trans-unit.target: 如果 absent ，则主机配置将重置为默认值。

trans-unit.source: If absent, will ensure that the certificate specified by thumbprint or the thumbprint of the cert at path is removed from the store specified.
trans-unit.target: 如果 absent ，将确保从指定的存储区中删除指纹或路径上cert的指纹所指定的证书。

trans-unit.source: If absent, will remove a DNS server.
trans-unit.target: 如果 absent ，将删除DNS服务器。

trans-unit.source: If absent, will remove an NTP server.
trans-unit.target: 如果 absent ，将删除NTP服务器。

trans-unit.source: If absent, will remove organization.
trans-unit.target: 如果 absent ，将删除组织。

trans-unit.source: If absent, will unset timezone.
trans-unit.target: 如果 absent ，将取消设置时区。

trans-unit.source: If absent, will verify IP pool is absent and will delete if needed.
trans-unit.target: 如果 absent ，将验证IP池是否存在，并在需要时将其删除。

trans-unit.source: If absent, will verify LAN Connectivity Policies are absent and will delete if needed.
trans-unit.target: 如果 absent ，将验证是否不存在 LAN连接策略，并在需要时将其删除。

trans-unit.source: If absent, will verify MAC pool is absent and will delete if needed.
trans-unit.target: 如果 absent ，将验证MAC池是否存在，并在需要时将其删除。

trans-unit.source: If absent, will verify SAN Connectivity Policies are absent and will delete if needed.
trans-unit.target: 如果 absent ，将验证是否不存在 SAN连接策略，并在需要时将其删除。

trans-unit.source: If absent, will verify Service Profile Templates are absent and will delete if needed.
trans-unit.target: 如果 absent ，将验证服务配置文件模板不存在，并将在需要时删除。

trans-unit.source: If absent, will verify UUID pool is absent and will delete if needed.
trans-unit.target: 如果 absent ，将验证UUID池是否存在，并在需要时将其删除。

trans-unit.source: If absent, will verify VLANs are absent and will delete if needed.
trans-unit.target: 如果 absent ，将验证VLAN是否不存在，并在需要时将其删除。

trans-unit.source: If absent, will verify VSANs are absent and will delete if needed.
trans-unit.target: 如果 absent ，将验证是否不存在Virtual SAN，并在需要时将其删除。

trans-unit.source: If absent, will verify WWNNs/WWPNs are absent and will delete if needed.
trans-unit.target: 如果 absent ，将验证WWNN / WWPN不存在，并将在需要时删除。

trans-unit.source: If absent, will verify that the Managed Objects are absent and will delete if needed.
trans-unit.target: 如果 absent ，将验证不存在托管对象，并在需要时将其删除。

trans-unit.source: If absent, will verify that the disk group policy is absent and will delete if needed.
trans-unit.target: 如果 absent ，将验证磁盘组策略不存在，并在需要时将其删除。

trans-unit.source: If absent, will verify that the storage profile is absent and will delete if needed.
trans-unit.target: 如果 absent ，将验证存储配置文件是否存在，并在需要时将其删除。

trans-unit.source: If absent, will verify the resource is absent and will delete if needed.
trans-unit.target: 如果 absent ，将验证资源是否存在，并在需要时将其删除。

trans-unit.source: If absent, will verify vHBA templates are absent and will delete if needed.
trans-unit.target: 如果 absent ，将验证vHBA模板是否存在，并在需要时将其删除。

trans-unit.source: If absent, will verify vNIC templates are absent and will delete if needed.
trans-unit.target: 如果 absent ，将验证vNIC模板是否存在，并在需要时将其删除。

trans-unit.source: If add, each alias in aliases will be added to the host entry.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 add ，则别名中的每个别名都将添加到主机条目中。

trans-unit.source: If add, the user is added to each group in groups where not already a member.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用 add ，则将用户添加到尚不属于该组的每个组中。

trans-unit.source: If always, the connection will only send email if the connection is Encrypted. If the server doesn't accept the encrypted connection it will fail.
trans-unit.target: 如果 always ，则仅当连接为加密状态时，该连接才会发送电子邮件。如果服务器不接受加密连接，它将失败。

trans-unit.source: If ansible-playbook fails, please follow the debug steps in Network Debug and Troubleshooting Guide.
trans-unit.target: 如果 ansible-playbook 失败，请按照《网络调试和故障排除指南》中的调试步骤进行操作。

trans-unit.source: If ansible_facts['distribution_version'] is greater than or equal to 12.04, this test returns True, otherwise False.
trans-unit.target: 如果 ansible_facts['distribution_version'] 大于或等于12.04，则此测试返回True，否则返回False。

trans-unit.source: If ansible_network_os is not specified for a host, then Ansible will attempt to automatically detect what network_os plugin to use.
trans-unit.target: 如果 ansible_network_os 不是一台主机指定的，那么Ansible将尝试自动检测一下 network_os 插件来使用。

trans-unit.source: If api_token is not set within the module, the following environment variables can be used in decreasing order of precedence ONLINE_TOKEN, ONLINE_API_KEY, ONLINE_OAUTH_TOKEN, ONLINE_API_TOKEN
trans-unit.target: 如果未在模块内设置 api_token ，则可以按降序优先级使用以下环境变量 ONLINE_TOKEN ， ONLINE_API_KEY ， ONLINE_OAUTH_TOKEN ， ONLINE_API_TOKEN

trans-unit.source: If api_token is not set within the module, the following environment variables can be used in decreasing order of precedence SCW_TOKEN, SCW_API_KEY, SCW_OAUTH_TOKEN or SCW_API_TOKEN.
trans-unit.target: 如果未在模块内设置 api_token ，则可以按优先级 SCW_TOKEN 使用以下环境变量SCW_TOKEN， SCW_API_KEY ， SCW_OAUTH_TOKEN 或 SCW_API_TOKEN 。

trans-unit.source: If auto is selected, the service will start at bootup.
trans-unit.target: 如果选择 auto ，则该服务将在启动时启动。

trans-unit.source: If backrefs is set, may contain backreferences that will get expanded with the regexp capture groups if the regexp matches.
trans-unit.target: 如果设置了 backrefs ，则可能包含反向引用，如果regexp匹配，则将使用 regexp 捕获组进行扩展。

trans-unit.source: If base64, data is a base64 string that is base64 decoded to bytes.
trans-unit.target: 如果 base64 ，则data是base64字符串，该字符串已被base64解码为字节。

trans-unit.source: If base64, secret is a base64 string that is base64 decoded to bytes.
trans-unit.target: 如果 base64 ，secret是base64字符串，该字符串将base64解码为字节。

trans-unit.source: If become is unavailable, use win_hotfix to install hotfixes instead of win_chocolatey as win_hotfix avoids using wusa.exe which cannot be run without become.
trans-unit.target: 如果 become 不可用，使用win_hotfix安装修补程序，而不是win_chocolatey作为win_hotfix使用避免 wusa.exe 不能没有运行 become 。

trans-unit.source: If ca_file parameter is not set, system wide CA certificate store is used.
trans-unit.target: 如果未设置 ca_file 参数，则使用系统范围的CA证书存储。

trans-unit.source: If change, the md5 checksum will be downloaded and verified if the destination already exist, to verify if they are identical. This was the behaviour before 2.6. Since it downloads the md5 before (maybe) downloading the artifact, and since some repository software, when acting as a proxy/cache, return a 404 error if the artifact has not been cached yet, it may fail unexpectedly. If you still need it, you should consider using always instead - if you deal with a checksum, it is better to use it to verify integrity after download.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 change ，将下载并验证md5校验和，如果目标已经存在，以验证它们是否相同。这是2.6之前的行为。由于它在（可能）下载工件之前先下载了md5，并且由于某些存储库软件在充当代理/缓存时，如果尚未缓存该工件，则会返回404错误，因此可能会意外失败。如果仍然需要它，则应考虑 always 使用-如果处理校验和，最好在下载后使用它来验证完整性。

trans-unit.source: If cleanup, clean up the async job cache (by default in ~/.ansible_async/) for the specified job jid.
trans-unit.target: 如果进行 cleanup ，请为指定的作业jid 清理异步作业缓存（默认情况下为 ~/.ansible_async/ ）。

trans-unit.source: If client_cert contains both the certificate and key, this option is not required.
trans-unit.target: 如果 client_cert 同时包含证书和密钥，则不需要此选项。

trans-unit.source: If clone is specified, org_name is the name of the new organization.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定了 clone ，则 org_name 是新组织的名称。

trans-unit.source: If cluster_name is not given, this parameter is required.
trans-unit.target: 如果未提供 cluster_name ，则此参数为必需。

trans-unit.source: If cluster_name is not set, then this parameter is required.
trans-unit.target: 如果未设置 cluster_name ，那么此参数是必需的。

trans-unit.source: If cluster_name is provided, then vmhba facts about all hosts from given cluster will be returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果提供了 cluster_name ，则将返回有关给定集群中所有主机的vmhba事实。

trans-unit.source: If cluster_name is provided, then vmhba information about all hosts from given cluster will be returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果提供了 cluster_name ，则将返回有关给定集群中所有主机的vmhba信息。

trans-unit.source: If cluster_name is provided, then vmnic facts about all hosts from given cluster will be returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果提供了 cluster_name ，则将返回有关给定集群中所有主机的vmnic事实。

trans-unit.source: If cluster_name is provided, then vmnic information about all hosts from given cluster will be returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果提供了 cluster_name ，则将返回有关给定集群中所有主机的vmnic信息。

trans-unit.source: If context is not provided, it will default to all.
trans-unit.target: 如果未提供 context ，则默认为 all 。

trans-unit.source: If cow format is used, disk will by created as sparse, so space will be allocated for the volume as needed, also known as thin provision.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用 cow 格式，则磁盘将创建为稀疏的，因此将根据需要为卷分配空间，这也称为精简配置。

trans-unit.source: If curated is selected the structure will be identical to input parameters of azure_rm_virtualmachinescaleset module.
trans-unit.target: 如果选择“ curated 则其结构将与“ azure_rm_virtualmachinescalescale”模块的输入参数相同。

trans-unit.source: If current, the current state of the VM will be fetched. You can access it with results.status
trans-unit.target: 如果为 current ，将获取VM的当前状态。您可以使用 results.status 访问它

trans-unit.source: If datastore or cluster_name are not set, this parameter is required.
trans-unit.target: 如果未设置 datastore 或 cluster_name ，则此参数为必需。

trans-unit.source: If datastore or datastore_cluster are not set, this parameter is required.
trans-unit.target: 如果未设置 datastore 或 datastore_cluster ，则需要此参数。

trans-unit.source: If datastore_cluster or cluster_name are not set, this parameter is required.
trans-unit.target: 如果未设置 datastore_cluster 或 cluster_name ，则此参数为必需。

trans-unit.source: If dest ends with '/', it will use the basename of the source file, similar to the copy module.
trans-unit.target: 如果 dest 以'/'结尾，它将使用源文件的基本名称，类似于复制模块。

trans-unit.source: If dest ends with \ then source or the contents of source will be copied to the directory without renaming.
trans-unit.target: 如果 dest 以\结尾，则source或source的内容将被复制到目录中而不重命名。

trans-unit.source: If dest file doesn’t exist, it is created.
trans-unit.target: 如果 dest 文件不存在，则会创建它。

trans-unit.source: If dest is a directory, either the server provided filename or, if none provided, the base name of the URL on the remote server will be used. If a directory, force has no effect.
trans-unit.target: 如果 dest 是目录，则将使用服务器提供的文件名；如果未提供，则将使用远程服务器上URL的基本名称。如果是目录，则 force 无效。

trans-unit.source: If dest is a directory, the file will always be downloaded (regardless of the force option), but replaced only if the contents changed..
trans-unit.target: 如果 dest 是目录，则将始终下载文件（与 force 选项无关），但仅在内容更改时才替换。

trans-unit.source: If dest is a non-existent path and if either dest ends with "/" or src is a directory, dest is created.
trans-unit.target: 如果 dest 是不存在的路径，并且 dest 以“ /”结尾或 src 是目录，则创建 dest 。

trans-unit.source: If dest is a nonexistent path, it will only be created if dest ends with "/" or "\", or src is a directory.
trans-unit.target: 如果 dest 是不存在的路径，则仅当 dest 以“ /”或“ \”结尾，或者 src 是目录时才创建。

trans-unit.source: If destination is set in CIDR notation format and mask is provided the mask parameter takes precedence.
trans-unit.target: 如果 destination 在CIDR符号格式设置和 mask 设置在 mask 参数优先。

trans-unit.source: If directory, all immediate subdirectories will be created if they do not exist.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 directory ，则将创建所有直接子目录（如果不存在）。

trans-unit.source: If directory, all intermediate subdirectories will be created if they do not exist. Since Ansible 1.7 they will be created with the supplied permissions.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 directory ，则将创建所有中间子目录（如果不存在）。从Ansible 1.7开始，将使用提供的权限创建它们。

trans-unit.source: If directory, the directory will be created.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 directory ，将创建目录。

trans-unit.source: If disabled will ensure the policy is configured, exists, but disabled.
trans-unit.target: 如果 disabled 将确保该策略已配置，存在但已禁用。

trans-unit.source: If docker_network or docker_volume were called with diff: yes, check_mode: yes or debug: yes, a return value called diff was returned of type list. To enable proper diff output, this was changed to type dict; the original list is returned as diff.differences.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用 diff: yes 调用了 docker_network 或 docker_volume ：是， check_mode: yes 或 debug: yes ，则返回了 diff 类型 list 的返回值。为了启用适当的差异输出，将其更改为 dict 类型；原始 list 以 diff.differences 返回。

trans-unit.source: If download, the md5 checksum will be downloaded and verified only after artifact download. This is the default.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 download ，则仅在下载工件后才下载并验证md5校验和。这是默认值。

trans-unit.source: If enable_ha is set to no, then this value is ignored.
trans-unit.target: 如果 enable_ha 设置为 no ，那么将忽略此值。

trans-unit.source: If enabled the host is fully operational.
trans-unit.target: 如果 enabled ，主机将完全运行。

trans-unit.source: If enabled will ensure the policy is configured, exists and enabled.
trans-unit.target: 如果 enabled 将确保该策略已配置，存在并启用。

trans-unit.source: If esxi_hostname is not given, this parameter is required.
trans-unit.target: 如果未提供 esxi_hostname ，则此参数为必需。

trans-unit.source: If esxi_hostname is provided, then vmhba facts about given host system will be returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果提供 esxi_hostname ，则将返回有关给定主机系统的vmhba事实。

trans-unit.source: If esxi_hostname is provided, then vmhba information about given host system will be returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果提供 esxi_hostname ，则将返回有关给定主机系统的vmhba信息。

trans-unit.source: If esxi_hostname is provided, then vmnic facts about given host system will be returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果提供 esxi_hostname ，则将返回有关给定主机系统的vmnic事实。

trans-unit.source: If esxi_hostname is provided, then vmnic information about given host system will be returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果提供 esxi_hostname ，则将返回有关给定主机系统的vmnic信息。

trans-unit.source: If esxi_hostname is specified, then will assign the license key to the ESXi host.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定了 esxi_hostname ，则将 license 密钥分配给ESXi主机。

trans-unit.source: If exact, the set of values will be forced to exactly those provided and no others.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 exact ，则该组值将被强制为与所提供的值完全相同，而没有其他值。

trans-unit.source: If export, will perform SCP export operations.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 export ，将执行SCP导出操作。

trans-unit.source: If exported, will ensure the file at path is a certificate specified by thumbprint.
trans-unit.target: 如果已 exported ，将确保路径中的文件是指纹指定的证书。

trans-unit.source: If false (NO CYCLE) is specified, any calls to nextval after the sequence has reached its maximum value will return an error. False (NO CYCLE) is the default.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定了 false （NO CYCLE），则在序列达到最大值后对nextval的任何调用都将返回错误。False（NO CYCLE）是默认值。

trans-unit.source: If false then query depends on name presence and value.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 false ,则查询取决于名称的存在和值。

trans-unit.source: If false, SSL certificates will not be validated.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 false ，则不会验证SSL证书。

trans-unit.source: If false, SSL certificates will not be validated. This should only be used on personally controlled devices using self-signed certificates.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 false ，则不会验证SSL证书。仅应在使用自签名证书的个人控制设备上使用。

trans-unit.source: If false, SSL certificates will not be validated. This should only set to false used on personally controlled sites using self-signed certificates.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 false ，则不会验证SSL证书。仅在使用自签名证书的个人控制站点上使用时，应将此字段设置为 false 。

trans-unit.source: If file, more information of the (existing) file will be returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 file ，则将返回（现有）文件的更多信息。

trans-unit.source: If file, the file will NOT be created if it does not exist, see the copy or template module if you want that behavior. If absent, directories will be recursively deleted, and files will be removed.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 file ，则如果文件不存在则不会创建该文件，如果需要此行为，请参见副本或模板模块。如果 absent ，将递归删除目录，并删除文件。

trans-unit.source: If file, without any other options this works mostly as a 'stat' and will return the current state of path. Even with other options (i.e mode), the file will be modified but will NOT be created if it does not exist; see the touch value or the copy or template module if you want that behavior.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 file ，则不带任何其他选项，这通常可以用作“ stat”，并将返回 path 的当前状态。即使使用其他选项（即 mode ），该文件也将被修改，但如果不存在则不会被创建；如果需要，请查看 touch 值或副本或模板模块。

trans-unit.source: If flags is set, this will be ignored.
trans-unit.target: 如果设置了 flags ，它将被忽略。

trans-unit.source: If folder is not set, then this parameter is required.
trans-unit.target: 如果未设置 folder ，那么此参数是必需的。

trans-unit.source: If gateway is not provided it will be set to 0.0.0.0.
trans-unit.target: 如果未提供 gateway ，则将其设置为 0.0.0.0 。

trans-unit.source: If hard, the hard link will be created or changed.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 hard ，则将创建或更改硬链接。

trans-unit.source: If import, will perform SCP import operations.
trans-unit.target: 如果 import ，将执行SCP导入操作。

trans-unit.source: If insertbefore is set, default value EOF will be ignored.
trans-unit.target: 如果设置了 insertbefore ，则默认值 EOF 将被忽略。

trans-unit.source: If instance_name is not specified, this field is required.
trans-unit.target: 如果未指定 instance_name ，则此字段为必填字段。

trans-unit.source: If key is unset, the module returns a list of dictionaries, where each dictionary is a row in the CSV file.

trans-unit.source: If latest a module is updated to the newest version. This option was added in version 2.8.

trans-unit.source: If request_type=renew, a forced renew will fail if the certificate being renewed has been issued within the past 30 days, regardless of the value of remaining_days or the return value of cert_days - the ECS API does not support the "renew" operation for certificates that are not at least 30 days old.
trans-unit.target: 如果 request_type=renew ，则在过去30天内发出了要续签的证书时，无论剩余值的值还是cert_days的返回值，强制更新都将失败-ECS API不支持证书的“续签”操作至少30天未满。

trans-unit.source: If request_type=renew, a renewal will fail if the certificate being renewed has been issued within the past 30 days, so do not set a remaining_days value that is within 30 days of the full lifetime of the certificate being acted upon. (e.g. if you are requesting Certificates with a 90 day lifetime, do not set remaining_days to a value 60 or higher).
trans-unit.target: 如果 request_type=renew ，则在过去30天内颁发了要续签的证书时，续签将失败，因此请不要在要执行的证书的整个有效期限内设置30天之内的剩余天数。（例如，如果您请求的证书的有效期为90天，请不要将剩余天数的值设置为 60 或更高）。

trans-unit.source: If restarted will ensure the app pool exists and will restart, this is never idempotent.
trans-unit.target: 如果 restarted 将确保应用程序池存在并且将重新启动，这绝不是幂等的。

trans-unit.source: If running then it will begin syncing if there is no active sync or will resume a suspended sync. If there is already a sync in progress, it will return with an OK status.
trans-unit.target: 如果 running 则它将在没有活动同步的情况下开始同步，或者将恢复暂停的同步。如果已经在进行同步，它将以OK状态返回。

trans-unit.source: If saved, the .tgz backup bundle will be saved in dest.

trans-unit.source: If secondary_pvlans isn't specified, the primary PVLANs and each secondary promiscuous PVLAN will be created.
trans-unit.target: 如果 secondary_pvlans 未指定，初级PVLANs和每个次级混杂PVLAN将被创建。

trans-unit.source: If set, each alias in aliases will be added to the host entry, and other aliases will be removed from the entry.
trans-unit.target: 如果 set ，则别名中的每个别名都将添加到主机条目，其他别名将从条目中删除。

trans-unit.target: 如果 src 和 dest 的文件，如果父目录 dest 不存在，那么任务将失败。

trans-unit.target: 如果 src 和 dest 是文件，则不会创建 dest 的父目录，并且如果该任务尚不存在，则该任务将失败。

trans-unit.source: If state is absent, name takes priority over email if both are specified.

trans-unit.target: 如果 state 为iscsidiscover，则表示iscsi属性用于发现目标

trans-unit.target: 如果 state 为iscsilogin，则表示iscsi属性用于登录到作为iscsi属性一部分传递的指定目标。

trans-unit.source: If state is absent then it will wait until the file does not exist.

trans-unit.source: If state is set to absent and VM exists, then VM is removed with its associated components.
trans-unit.target: 如果 state 设置为“ absent 且VM存在，则VM及其相关组件将被删除。

trans-unit.target: 如果将 state 设置为“ absent 并且虚拟机存在，则将删除指定的虚拟机及其关联的组件。

trans-unit.source: If state is set to absent, disk will be removed permanently from virtual machine configuration and from VMware storage.
trans-unit.target: 如果 state 设置为“ absent ，则磁盘将从虚拟机配置和VMware存储中永久删除。

trans-unit.source: If state is set to add or present will add the tags to the existing tag list of the given object.
trans-unit.target: 如果将 state 设置为 add 或 present ,则会将标签添加到给定对象的现有标签列表中。

trans-unit.source: If state is set to poweredoff and virtual machine exists with powerstate other than powered off, then the specified virtual machine is powered off.
trans-unit.target: 如果 state 被设置为 poweredoff 和虚拟机与电源状态其它存在比断电，则该指定的虚拟机被断电。

trans-unit.source: If state is set to poweredon and VM does not exist, then VM is deployed with given parameters and powered on automatically.
trans-unit.target: 如果 state 设置为“ poweredon 并且VM不存在，则VM将使用给定的参数进行部署并自动开机。

trans-unit.source: If state is set to poweredon and virtual machine exists with powerstate other than powered on, then the specified virtual machine is powered on.
trans-unit.target: 如果将 state 设置为“ poweredon 打开电源”，并且虚拟机以电源状态（而非打开电源）存在，则指定的虚拟机已打开电源。

trans-unit.source: If state is set to present and VM does not exist, then VM is deployed with given parameters.
trans-unit.target: 如果将 state 设置为 present 且VM不存在，则将使用给定参数部署VM。

trans-unit.source: If state is set to present and VM exists, ensure the VM configuration conforms to given parameters.
trans-unit.target: 如果 state 设置为 present 并且虚拟机存在，请确保虚拟机配置符合给定的参数。

trans-unit.source: If state is set to present and disk exists with different size, disk size is increased.
trans-unit.target: 如果 state 设置为 present 并且磁盘存在不同的大小，则磁盘大小会增加。

trans-unit.source: If state is set to present and virtual machine exists, ensure the virtual machine configurations conforms to task arguments.
trans-unit.target: 如果 state 设置为 present 并且虚拟机存在，请确保虚拟机配置符合任务参数。

trans-unit.source: If state is set to present, disk will be added if not present at given SCSI Controller and Unit Number.
trans-unit.target: 如果将 state 设置为 present ，则在给定的SCSI控制器和单元号不存在的情况下将添加磁盘。

trans-unit.source: If state is set to present, then VM is just checked for existence and facts are returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果将 state 设置为 present ，则仅检查VM的存在并返回事实。

trans-unit.source: If state is set to rebootguest and virtual machine exists, then the virtual machine is rebooted.
trans-unit.target: 如果 state 设置为 rebootguest 并且虚拟机存在，则虚拟机将重新启动。

trans-unit.source: If state is set to remove or absent will remove the tags from the existing tag list of the given object.
trans-unit.target: 如果将 state 设置为“ remove 或“ absent 则会从给定对象的现有标签列表中删除标签。

trans-unit.target: 如果 state 设置为 restarted 并且虚拟机存在，则虚拟机将重新启动。

trans-unit.source: If state is set to set will replace the tags of the given objects with the user defined list of tags.

trans-unit.source: If state set to shutdown-host and force as true, then host system is shutdown regardless of whether it is in maintenance mode.

trans-unit.source: If state=present then this value MUST be set.

trans-unit.source: If touch, an empty file will be created if the path does not exist, while an existing file or directory will receive updated file access and modification times (similar to the way touch works from the command line).

trans-unit.source: If true then name is ignored.

trans-unit.target: 如果 vlan_trunk 配置为true，则可以是多个范围和数字的组合，例如：1-200、205、400-4094。

trans-unit.source: If yes allows install modules that contains commands those have the same names as commands that already exists.

trans-unit.source: If yes do not get a cached copy.
trans-unit.target: 如果 yes ，则不获取缓存的副本。

trans-unit.source: If yes installs modules marked as prereleases.

trans-unit.source: If yes it will go to the remote/target machine for the src.

trans-unit.source: If yes make invalid entries a fatal error, otherwise skip and continue.
trans-unit.target: 如果 yes 则将无效条目设为致命错误，否则请跳过并继续。

trans-unit.source: If yes the module will save the configuration on the netscaler node if it makes any changes.

trans-unit.source: If yes will apply and activate existing inactive policy. If no, it will deactivate existing active policy. Generally should be yes only in cases where you want to activate new or existing policy.

trans-unit.source: If yes, add or change the failover. This is applicable only for A records.

trans-unit.source: If yes, add the user to the groups specified in groups.

trans-unit.source: If yes, allows to create new filesystem on devices that already has filesystem.

trans-unit.source: If yes, allows to remove volume group with logical volumes.

trans-unit.source: If yes, any modified files in the working repository will be discarded. Prior to 0.7, this was always 'yes' and could not be disabled. Prior to 1.9, the default was `yes`
trans-unit.target: 如果 yes ，则将删除工作存储库中的任何已修改文件。在0.7之前，这始终是“是”，不能禁用。在1.9之前，默认值为`yes'

trans-unit.source: If yes, any modified files in the working tree will be discarded. Before 1.9 the default value was yes.

trans-unit.source: If yes, modified files will be discarded. If no, module will fail if it encounters modified files. Prior to 1.9 the default was yes.

trans-unit.source: If yes, skip image verification.

trans-unit.source: If yes, specifies that the NAT sends ARP requests.

trans-unit.source: If yes, text will be parsed as markdown.

trans-unit.source: If yes, the VM will be update with new value.

trans-unit.source: If yes, they are python regexes.

trans-unit.source: If yes, which will replace the remote file when contents are different than the source.

trans-unit.target: 如果 yes ，将每次下载文件，如果内容更改则替换文件。如果为 no ，则仅在文件不存在或远程文件的修改时间比本地文件更新的时间下载文件。

trans-unit.source: If True FCP storage domain LUNs will be overridden before adding.

trans-unit.source: If True SSH keys will be regenerated on Virtual Machine.
trans-unit.target: 如果True SSH密钥将在虚拟机上重新生成。

trans-unit.source: If True auto-convergence is used during live migration of virtual machines.

trans-unit.source: If error_option=stop-on-error, abort the config edit on first error.

trans-unit.target: 如果fast_forward设置为 True ，则fast_forward将绕过查询处理层（重写，缓存），并直接将查询直接传递给后端服务器。如果省略proxysql数据库默认FAST_FORWARD是 False 。

trans-unit.target: 如果negate_match_pattern设置为 True ，则仅与查询文本不匹配的查询将被视为匹配项。这在与match_pattern匹配的正则表达式前面充当NOT运算符。

trans-unit.source: If negativeno VMs in this group should run on the host defined by host_rule.
trans-unit.target: 如果为负，则该组中的任何 VM均不应在 host_rule 定义的主机上运行。

trans-unit.source: If negativeno VMs in this group should run on the this host.
trans-unit.target: 如果为负，则该组中的任何 VM均不应在此主机上运行。

trans-unit.source: If networks parameter is provided, will inspect each network to see if there exists a bridge network with optional parameter com.docker.network.bridge.host_binding_ipv4. If such a network is found, then published ports where no host IP address is specified will be bound to the host IP pointed to by com.docker.network.bridge.host_binding_ipv4. Note that the first bridge network with a com.docker.network.bridge.host_binding_ipv4 value encountered in the list of networks is the one that will be used.
trans-unit.target: 如果提供了networks参数，将检查每个网络以查看是否存在带有可选参数 com.docker.network.bridge.host_binding_ipv4 的网桥网络。如果找到了这样的网络，则未指定主机IP地址的已发布端口将绑定到 com.docker.network.bridge.host_binding_ipv4 指向的主机IP 。注意，第一桥网络与 com.docker.network.bridge.host_binding_ipv4 在列表中遇到的价值网络是将要使用的一个。

trans-unit.source: If networks_cli_compatible is set to yes, this module will behave as docker run --network and will *not* add the default network if networks is specified. If networks is not specified, the default network will be attached.
trans-unit.target: 如果networks_cli_compatible设置为 yes ，该模块将表现为 docker run --network 如果将*不*添加默认的网络网络中指定。如果网络没有指定，默认网络将被连接。

trans-unit.source: If no Instance Type won't be set as highly available.
trans-unit.target: 如果没有，则不会将“实例类型”设置为高可用性。

trans-unit.source: If no Virtual Machine will be unset as stateless.
trans-unit.target: 如果没有，虚拟机将被取消设置为无状态。

trans-unit.source: If no Virtual Machine won't be set as delete protected.
trans-unit.target: 如果没有，则不会将虚拟机设置为删除保护。

trans-unit.source: If no Virtual Machine won't be set as highly available.
trans-unit.target: 如果没有，则不会将虚拟机设置为高可用性。

trans-unit.source: If option is not presented for the interface and state is present option will be added. If option already exists and is not pre-up, up, post-up or down, it's value will be updated. pre-up, up, post-up and down options can't be updated, only adding new options, removing existing ones or cleaning the whole option set are supported
trans-unit.target: 如果选项并不针对该接口和状态是 present 选项将被添加。如果option已经存在并且不是 pre-up ， up ， post-up 或 down ，则其值将被更新。 pre-up ， up ， post-up 和 down 选项无法更新，仅支持添加新选项，删除现有选项或清理整个选项集

trans-unit.source: If org is not specified, the organization from the client represented by client_id is used.
trans-unit.target: 如果未指定org，则使用client_id代表的来自客户端的组织。

trans-unit.target: 如果指定ou，它将覆盖CSR主题可分辨名称中存在的组织单位“ ou =“（如果有）。

trans-unit.source: If owner is not defined, the owner will be set as login_user or session_role.
trans-unit.target: 如果业主没有定义，车主将被设置为login_user或session_role。

trans-unit.source: If path is a file or directory, rights can be any right under MSDN FileSystemRights https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/system.security.accesscontrol.filesystemrights.aspx.
trans-unit.target: 如果path是文件或目录，则权限可以是MSDN FileSystemRights https://msdn.microsoft.com/zh-cn/library/system.security.accesscontrol.filesystemrights.aspx下的任何权限。

trans-unit.source: If path is a registry key, rights can be any right under MSDN RegistryRights https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/system.security.accesscontrol.registryrights.aspx.
trans-unit.target: 如果path是注册表项，则权限可以是MSDN RegistryRights https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/system.security.accesscontrol.registryrights.aspx下的任何权限。

trans-unit.source: If positiveall VMs in this group should run on the host defined by host_rule.
trans-unit.target: 如果为正，则该组中的所有 VM应在 host_rule 定义的主机上运行。

trans-unit.target: 如果为正，则该组中的所有 VM应在该主机上运行。

trans-unit.source: If process_username is not specified, then the remote process will run under a Network Logon under this account.
trans-unit.target: 如果未指定process_username，则远程进程将在该帐户下的“网络登录”下运行。

trans-unit.source: If retrieve_orders is object_list, this will be a list of objects.
trans-unit.target: 如果retrieve_orders是 object_list ，则这将是一个对象列表。

trans-unit.source: If retrieve_orders is url_list, this will be a list of URLs.
trans-unit.target: 如果retrieve_orders是 url_list ，则这将是一个URL列表。

trans-unit.source: If self is true then this parameter is ignored.
trans-unit.target: 如果self为 true ,则忽略此参数。

trans-unit.source: If separated, each vGPU is placed on a separate physical card, if possible. This can be useful for improving vGPU performance.
trans-unit.target: 如果分开，则每个vGPU将放置在单独的物理卡上（如果可能）。这对于提高vGPU性能很有用。

trans-unit.source: If services is defined, only the containers listed there will be restarted.
trans-unit.target: 如果定义了服务，则仅其中列出的容器将重新启动。

trans-unit.source: If services is defined, only the containers listed there will be stopped.
trans-unit.target: 如果定义了服务，则仅停止列出的容器。

trans-unit.source: If state is absent and overwrite is True, this module will remove the given resource record unconditionally. If state is absent and overwrite is False, this module will fail if the provided record_data do not match exactly with the existing resource record's record_data.
trans-unit.target: 如果状态是 absent ，并改写为 True ，该模块将无条件删除指定的资源记录。如果状态是 absent ，并改写为 False ，如果所提供的record_data不与现有的资源记录的record_data完全匹配此模块将失败。

trans-unit.source: If state is latest, the latest pre-release package will be installed.
trans-unit.target: 如果state为 latest ，则将安装最新的预发行软件包。

trans-unit.source: If state is present and overwrite is True, this module will replace an existing resource record of the same name with the provided record_data. If state is present and overwrite is False, this module will fail if there is an existing resource record with the same name and type, but different resource data.
trans-unit.target: 如果状态是 present 和覆盖是 True ，这个模块将替代同名的现有资源记录与所提供的record_data。如果状态是 present 和覆盖是 False ，如果使用相同的名称和类型，但不同的资源数据的现有资源记录，该模块将失败。

trans-unit.source: If state=="absent" then all storage pool drives will be erase
trans-unit.target: 如果state ==“ absent”，则所有存储池驱动器将被擦除

trans-unit.source: If state=="present" then delete all available storage array drives that have security enabled.
trans-unit.target: 如果state ==“ present”，则删除所有已启用安全性的可用存储阵列驱动器。

trans-unit.source: If state=absent other options will be ignored except of name and schema.
trans-unit.target: 如果state = absent，则除了name和schema之外，其他选项将被忽略。

trans-unit.source: If state=absent, in case the relationship with the parent is a member relationship, will unassign the entity as a member of the parent.
trans-unit.target: 如果state = absent，如果与父级的关系是成员关系，则将取消将该实体分配为父级的成员。

trans-unit.source: If state=absent, stack will be removed.
trans-unit.target: 如果state = absent，则将删除堆栈。

trans-unit.source: If state=absent, the route will be removed, regardless of the non-required options.
trans-unit.target: 如果state = absent，则该路由将被删除，而不管不需要的选项如何。

trans-unit.source: If state=absent, the route will be removed, regardless of the non-required parameters.
trans-unit.target: 如果state = absent，则该路由将被删除，而与不需要的参数无关。

trans-unit.source: If state=absent, the vrf will be removed, regardless of the non-required parameters.
trans-unit.target: 如果state = absent，则将删除vrf，而与不需要的参数无关。

trans-unit.source: If state=exact and value is an empty list, all values for this attribute will be removed.
trans-unit.target: 如果state = exact并且value是一个空列表，则将删除此属性的所有值。

trans-unit.source: If state=present and deployment exists, it will be updated.
trans-unit.target: 如果state = present并且部署存在，则将对其进行更新。

trans-unit.source: If state=present, attributes necessary to create an entry. Existing entries are never modified. To assert specific attribute values on an existing entry, use ldap_attr module instead.
trans-unit.target: 如果state = present，则创建条目所需的属性。现有条目永远不会被修改。要在现有条目上声明特定的属性值，请改用ldap_attr模块。

trans-unit.source: If state=present, in case the entity already exists, will update the entity if it is needed.
trans-unit.target: 如果state = present，如果该实体已经存在，则将在需要时更新该实体。

trans-unit.source: If state=present, in case the relationship with the parent is a member relationship, will assign the entity as a member of the parent.
trans-unit.target: 如果state = present，如果与父级的关系是成员关系，则将实体分配为父级的成员。

trans-unit.source: If state=present, template will be created.
trans-unit.target: 如果state = present，将创建模板。

trans-unit.source: If state=present, value or list of values to use when creating the entry. It can either be a string or an actual list of strings.
trans-unit.target: 如果state = present，则创建条目时要使用的值或值列表。它可以是字符串，也可以是实际的字符串列表。

trans-unit.source: If storage_encrypted is true and and this option is not provided, the default encryption key is used.
trans-unit.target: 如果storage_encrypted为true并且未提供此选项，则使用默认的加密密钥。

trans-unit.source: If subject_alt_name is specified, it will override the subject alternate names in the CSR.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定subject_alt_name，它将覆盖CSR中的使用者替代名称。

trans-unit.source: If throttle is a percentage and bandwidth is 0 then bandwidth throttling will be disabled. If throttle is expressed as a data rate (bytes/sec) then this option is ignored. Default is 0 (no bandwidth throttling).
trans-unit.target: 如果节流为百分比，带宽为 0 ,则将禁用带宽节流。如果节流表示为数据速率（字节/秒），则忽略此选项。默认值为 0 （不限制带宽）。

trans-unit.source: If topic is not specified this will have no impact, but the SES setting is updated even if there is no topic.
trans-unit.target: 如果未指定主题，则不会有任何影响，但是即使没有主题，SES设置也会更新。

trans-unit.source: If true all networks will be synchronized before modification
trans-unit.target: 如果为true，则所有网络将在修改之前进行同步

trans-unit.source: If true all the attributes of the hosts should be included in the response.
trans-unit.target: 如果为true，则应在响应中包括主机的所有属性。

trans-unit.source: If true all the attributes of the virtual machines should be included in the response.
trans-unit.target: 如果为true，则应在响应中包括虚拟机的所有属性。

trans-unit.source: If true allow a MAC address to be used multiple times in a pool.
trans-unit.target: 如果为true，则允许在一个池中多次使用MAC地址。

trans-unit.source: If true and state is present save memory of the Virtual Machine if it's running.
trans-unit.target: 如果为true且存在 state 则在虚拟机正在运行时保存其内存。

trans-unit.source: If true and state is restore restore memory of the Virtual Machine.
trans-unit.target: 如果为true，并且 state 为restore，则还原虚拟机的内存。

trans-unit.source: If true and state is upgraded reboot host after successful upgrade.
trans-unit.target: 如果为true并且 state 已升级，则在成功升级后重新引导主机。

trans-unit.source: If true and state is upgraded run check for upgrade action before executing upgrade action.
trans-unit.target: 如果为true并且 state 已升级，请在执行升级操作之前运行检查升级操作。

trans-unit.source: If true disable the graphics console for this virtual machine.
trans-unit.target: 如果为true，则为此虚拟机禁用图形控制台。

trans-unit.source: If true network configuration will be persistent, otherwise it is temporary. Default true since Ansible 2.8.
trans-unit.target: 如果真正的网络配置将是持久的，否则它将是临时的。自Ansible 2.8起默认为true。

trans-unit.source: If true options will be encrypted when send to agent.
trans-unit.target: 如果为true，则在发送给代理时，选项将被加密。

trans-unit.source: If true performed search will take case into account.
trans-unit.target: 如果为真，则将考虑大小写。

trans-unit.source: If true the storage domain don't have to be in MAINTENANCE state, so the storage connection is updated.
trans-unit.target: 如果为true，则存储域不必处于MAINTENANCE状态，因此将更新存储连接。

trans-unit.source: If true verify connectivity between host and engine.
trans-unit.target: 如果为true，请验证主机与引擎之间的连接。

trans-unit.source: If true, in addition return remote_vv_file inside vm dictionary, which contains compatible content for remote-viewer application. Works only state is running.
trans-unit.target: 如果为true，则另外在vm字典中返回remote_vv_file，该字典包含适用于remote-viewer应用程序的兼容内容。作品只有 state 正在运行。

trans-unit.source: If true, the VM will migrate to any available host.
trans-unit.target: 如果为true，则VM将迁移到任何可用主机。

trans-unit.source: If true, the VM will migrate when placement_policy=user-migratable but not when placement_policy=pinned.

trans-unit.source: If true, the sound card is added to the instance type.

trans-unit.source: If true, the sound card is added to the virtual machine.
trans-unit.target: 如果为true，则将声卡添加到虚拟机。

trans-unit.source: If true, the update will not be applied to the VM immediately and will be only applied when virtual machine is restarted.
trans-unit.target: 如果为true，则更新将不会立即应用于VM，并且仅在重新启动虚拟机时才会应用。

trans-unit.source: If true, use memory ballooning.
trans-unit.target: 如果为true，请使用内存膨胀。

trans-unit.source: If true, use smart card authentication.
trans-unit.target: 如果为true，则使用智能卡身份验证。

trans-unit.source: If true, virtio scsi will be enabled.
trans-unit.target: 如果为true，则将启用virtio scsi。

trans-unit.source: If truekernel_params, initrd_path and kernel_path will persist in virtual machine configuration, if False it will be used for run once.
trans-unit.target: 如果为true kernel_params ，则 initrd_path 和 kernel_path 将保留在虚拟机配置中，如果为False，则将其运行一次。

trans-unit.source: If type is database, this parameter can be omitted, in which case privileges are set for the database specified via database.
trans-unit.target: 如果类型是 database ，该参数可以被省略，在这种情况下，权限用于经由指定的数据库中设置数据库。

trans-unit.source: If type is table, partition table, sequence or function, the special valueALL_IN_SCHEMA can be provided instead to specify all database objects of type type in the schema specified via schema. trans-unit.target: 如果type是 table ， partition table ， sequence 或 function ，则可以提供特殊值 ALL_IN_SCHEMA 来指定通过schema指定的模式中所有type 类型的数据库对象。（这也适用于PostgreSQL <9.0。）（ ALL_IN_SCHEMA 从2.8版开始可用于 function 和 partition table ）

trans-unit.source: If type is function, colons (":") in object names will be replaced with commas (needed to specify function signatures, see examples)
trans-unit.target: 如果type为function，则对象名称中的冒号（“：”）将替换为逗号（需要指定函数签名，请参见示例）

trans-unit.source: If undeploy it means this host should un-deploy hosted engine components and this host will not function as part of the High Availability cluster.

trans-unit.source: If use_ssl is set to True, connections by this user will be made using SSL connections. If omitted the proxysql database default for use_ssl is False.
trans-unit.target: 如果use_ssl设置为 True ，则此用户将使用SSL连接建立连接。如果省略proxysql数据库默认USE_SSL是 False 。

trans-unit.source: If uuid option is provided, it takes precedence over name for server selection. This allows to update the server’s name.
trans-unit.target: 如果提供了uuid选项，则在选择服务器时它优先于名称。这样可以更新服务器的名称。

trans-unit.source: If wait_for_public_IPv is set and state is active, the module will wait for both events consequently, applying the timeout twice.
trans-unit.target: 如果设置了wait_for_public_IPv且状态为 active ，则模块将因此等待两个事件，并应用两次超时。

trans-unit.source: If yes Instance Type will be set as highly available.
trans-unit.target: 如果是，则将“实例类型”设置为高可用性。

trans-unit.source: If yes VM cannot start if it does not satisfy the vm_rule.
trans-unit.target: 如果是，则 VM如果不满足 vm_rule 则无法启动。

trans-unit.source: If yes VM cannot start on host if it does not satisfy the host_rule.
trans-unit.target: 如果是，则 VM如果不满足 host_rule 则无法在主机上启动。

trans-unit.source: If yes Virtual Machine will be set as delete protected.
trans-unit.target: 如果是，则将虚拟机设置为删除保护。

trans-unit.source: If yes Virtual Machine will be set as highly available.
trans-unit.target: 如果是，则将虚拟机设置为高可用性。

trans-unit.source: If yes Virtual Machine will be set as stateless.
trans-unit.target: 如果是，则将虚拟机设置为无状态。

trans-unit.source: If yes the cloud_init or sysprep parameters will be saved for the virtual machine and the virtual machine won't be started as run-once.
trans-unit.target: 如果是， cloud_init 虚拟机保存cloud_init或 sysprep 参数，并且虚拟机不会一次运行启动。

trans-unit.source: If yes the module will fetch additional data from the API.
trans-unit.target: 如果是，则该模块将从API中获取其他数据。

trans-unit.source: If yes then the disks of the created virtual machine will be cloned and independent of the template.
trans-unit.target: 如果是，则将克隆创建的虚拟机的磁盘，并且与模板无关。

trans-unit.source: If yes, indicates that the group created is a system group.

trans-unit.target: 如果Ansible检测到当前的循环正在使用一个已经被定义的变量,它将引发一个错误,使任务失败。

trans-unit.source: If Ansible is installed as root:
trans-unit.target: 如果Ansible是以root身份安装的。

trans-unit.source: If Ansible is installed only for your user:
trans-unit.target: 如果Ansible只为您的用户安装。

trans-unit.source: If Ansible modules are the tools in your workshop, playbooks are your instruction manuals, and your inventory of hosts are your raw material.
trans-unit.target: 如果说Ansible模块是你车间里的工具,那么游戏本就是你的说明书,而你的主机库存就是你的原材料。

trans-unit.source: If Ansible were to load ansible.cfg from a world-writable current working directory, it would create a serious security risk. Another user could place their own config file there, designed to make Ansible run malicious code both locally and remotely, possibly with elevated privileges. For this reason, Ansible will not automatically load a config file from the current working directory if the directory is world-writable.
trans-unit.target: 如果Ansible 要从可写入世界的当前工作目录中加载 ansible.cfg ，将带来严重的安全风险。另一个用户可以在其中放置自己的配置文件，该文件旨在使Ansible在本地和远程运行恶意代码，并可能具有较高的特权。因此，如果该目录是可写的，则Ansible不会自动从当前工作目录中加载配置文件。

trans-unit.source: If Backend store is lvm, specify the name of the volume group.

trans-unit.source: If Cloud CDN is enabled. null if not set.

trans-unit.source: If False, append a newline to the data. Default False
trans-unit.target: 如果为False,则在数据中添加一个新行。默认为False

trans-unit.source: If Group Members are defined, and mode="delete", only group members will be removed.
